title: Berlitz-Italian CD & Rush Hour Italian CD
description:
Mood: assertive 

Status: Patient - (waiting for the new V3 release of Rosetta Stone)

These are MP3 Audio files full of interactivity, music, and the classic phrases of berlitz,basic itallain for beginners, rich vocabulary learning, you might use this as a supplement to any multimedia course.

As you can see, some files are missing, these were damaged, that&#039;s why you don&#039;t see it here, the rest is still good enough to familiarize yourself with your new language
